alert.note: Alert for Northeast Siskiyou and Northwest Modoc Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 10 at 1:50PM PDT until April 11 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 11 PM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Siskiyou and northwest Modoc Counties, and the Klamath Basin, including Tulelake, Klamath Falls Bonanza, and portions of highways 97, 140, 39, and 139. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 11 PM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Siskiyou and Northwest Modoc Counties
